duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides training and oversight to site employees and provides general operational guidance; serves as role model to other team members
Recruiting, interviewing, onboarding, & training new crew members
Understanding the shop’s financials to drive results and utilize budget wisely
Ensures policies, practices and procedures are understood and followed
Works safely and reports safety or maintenance issues
Maintain cleanliness of work environment and inventory
Performs Crew Member duties as needed to ensure quality and timely customer service
Guides cars onto the track with a focused, pleasant, and competent demeanor
Performs visual inspections of the condition of each vehicle prior to entering the tunnel
